item.title: The Basics of Rocket Engine Plumbing
item.description: An ‘artistic’ rendition of engine cycles As I’ve been reading more about software design patterns, I recalled a bit of reading I did during university on rocket engines cycles and how the topic could be thought of in similar terms to a design pattern. The concept of a program’s pattern referring to a well recognised way of solving a particular problem. Businesses typically like to implement them in their software designs due to the benefits:
